title: Samsung USB 2.0 Slim DVD/RW External Drive SE208GBRSBD Overview
description:
Samsung USB 2.0 Slim DVD+/-RW External Drive - SE-208GB/RSBD - http://www.abt.com/product/87144/Samsung-SE208GBRSBD.html

Features:
• USB 2.0 (3.0 Compatible) Interface
• Buffer Under Run Free Technology
• Tilt Actuator Compensation Technology (T.A.C.)
• Read and Write up to 8x on DVD Discs
• Read and Write up to 24x on CD Discs
• 0.75MB Cache
• Supports Double Layer DVD Disc (6x Read/Write)
• Windows and Mac Compatible
